name: Frostbite Spider

aspects.high_concept: Giant Venomous Arachnid of Skyrim's Depths

stunts: Poison Bite: When successfully attacking with Fight, inflict sticky aspect 'Poisoned' (one free invoke for allies)
Web Spit: Once per scene, create aspect 'Entangled in Webs' on target zone with two free invokes
Cave Dweller: +2 to Notice in dark environments
notes: Frostbite Spiders are giant spiders common in Skyrim's caves and ruins. They attack with venomous bites and can spit webbing to trap prey. Often found in small groups. Vulnerable to fire.
combat_tactics: Spiders prefer ambush tactics, hiding on ceilings or in dark corners. They use webs to immobilize targets before closing for melee attacks. In groups, they coordinate to surround prey.
